website_summaries.verdict: This colorful claw machine has features that excite youngsters, and it's fun for the whole family. The long warranty is a welcome bonus.
pros: A festive claw machine that's easy to use
Has 3 joysticks and will fit lots of toys and treats up to 2 inches in size
Comes with 30 tokens that are reusable
cons: Plays music that is somewhat loud, and there is no volume control

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to get kids motivated to earn money.
customer_reviews.text: OMG I got this today and I Couldn’t wait to try it! I snagged a few toys just to see and I know the kids r gonna love it. They’ll earn tokens to play by doing chores lol. Only downside it’s LOUD! Wish there was a Volume control
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory
customer_reviews.text: Good in theory, but not in execution. Concept is great, sound is great (albeit a bit loud), but the kids could NOT pick anything up with the claw! I tried almost a dozen different things: gumballs, individually wrapped swedish fish, mini pb cups and other Hershey miniatures, even plastic bling rings for the girls. No one could get anything and I was left with 30 frustrated kids. Ended up returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine for the price, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Works okay but leaves a little too be desired. Claw can't reach all areas of the case. It is very difficult to get the plastic off the claw. Not a very big opening for loading and unloading. The biggest issue is the volume. It is incredibly loud and there is no volume control. With all that being said, for the price it really is a decent machine. The kids will love it and won't notice much of the issues I've mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Derick R

customer_reviews.title: Our Grandson loved it. The claw stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our grandson’s birthday. We couldn’t find it anywhere except for Amazon. He absolutely loved it. The music was very loud and the volume could not be adjusted. Before I purchased it I read many reviews that mentioned be extra careful when unwrapping the claw itself. We followed those suggestions. The next day the claw would not open. My grandson was disappointed. We decided to return it. We didn’t want to replace it. I was afraid the same thing might happen again. We decided to give our grandson an Amazon gift card.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: What a fun idea. My kids love it. Hours of entertainment and a great way for the little ones to do chores. When they are done cleaning up they get a coin to play the game and get a candy.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old has been begging for a claw machine. We got this one and easily set it up. We threw some random candy in it. He was so excited to try it. After many attempts, he just couldn’t “win” anything. My son just ends up sticking his hand up the drop box and grabs his prize. The claw tends to get stuck on the plastic drop box part. Also, the music is fun, but it is loud. It would be nice if there was a way to control the volume. Overall, the machine is a little disappointing to me, but my 5 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Unique and fun gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for father’s day, and filled it with candy and Easter eggs holding bigger gifts like concert tickets. It was so fun and different, and appropriately priced for the quality. My kids love playing it with him. My only complaint, as others have mentioned, is the volume. The song is very loud and can not be turned off. It’s cute the first time or two and then it gets really tiresome.
customer_reviews.author: hockeywife76

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a little confusing, I couldn't figure out how I was suppose to get the plastic off of the Claw, but I eventually did get it out on my own. It needs better directions. however my daughter has a blast with it, it is fun! it needs 3D batteries, which I didn't have, but got the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the mini-arcade
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for display purposes. I also collect scaled down arcade cabinets and figured this would add a little more detail to the set-up. I must say, it's pretty cool. The machine lights up and plays music when a coun is inserted. The only two things I can say negatively about this unit is the music is rather loud and accessing the main prize area were the claw is located is a bit of a nuisance. Other than that, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Linc Mobb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Claw Machine
customer_reviews.text: My two girls love it! My 8 year old loves claw machines and wants to try them wherever we go. Bought this as a gift for her and it was perfect. Fun music, and love that we can switch out the toys whenever we want. My 4 year old also likes to play with it. May have to get a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Grandson's Birthday in 2 months. I just opened it to see if it worked as some reviewers could not work theirs or arrived that way. This machine looks Fun! I undid the plastic on the claw and opened it and put the batteries in and it worked so nice! Now I just have to get prizes for the inside. Funny music like an arcade but that's what the kids love! I am sure he will enjoy and cant wait to give it to him.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: The Claw
customer_reviews.text: This is a tiny, cheap little thing and noisy all the way around. The claw makes a grinding noise when it’s moving around and the carnival music is super annoying, but my kids love it and play with it everyday. It’s hard to get it to pick stuff up, I can’t on my first try but it is possible. For $40 its not horrible. It keeps my kids (aged 2 & 5) entertained during this pandemic, and they like it so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Never worked properly, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this with her birthday money and was so excited. Overall it is very cute and we really wish it worked properly. The biggest issue is that the entire machine shuts off whenever she uses the forward/backward lever essentially making the product useless. She was able to find a workaround and manually moves the claw forward or back with her hand from the top of the machine where you load toys. But of course she should not have to do this. Additionally the toy is WAY TO LOUD and you are not able to turn the volume down or off. The ability to turn the sound off would be ideal!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Got It!
customer_reviews.text: Oh this is SO perfect for the little ones!! So glad I got it. When kids come for a visit they will be able to “win” a prize! Requires smaller gifts but still perfect entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Arla

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: This toy is super loud and has no volume control, which is a huge negative. We damped the sound over the speaker with adhesive foam used for sealing windows. It helped, but dammit man. Otherwise the machine functions and the kids really like it. The toys are a challenge. Mini airheads and smarties don’t really work. Slap bracelets and mini emoji studies worked best. Poof ball novelties were too squishy to pick up. Timed so you get multiple tries before your turn ends. Good for my 8 year old. Definitely not for really young kids.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer_aws

customer_reviews.title: Crappy. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly pretty passed my son has been impatiently waiting for this finally came ran to the store to get batteries came back popped the batteries in everything turns on and levers work BUT the claw never opens to grab anything!!!! My son is sitting here with tears of disappointment!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute and really loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this claw machine for my grandsons birthday. I filled it with candies, bubblegum, and little prizes. He and his little brother love it! I think it is adorable and have watched my little guys play with it over and over again and it has never failed! The only down side is the volume. It is loud! It plays cute circus music but there is no volume control on the machine. It does get annoying after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t work when we first opened it. The claw would not open, so my husband unscrewed everything to get on the inside and move the object around until it worked. I was using it for a Harvest Festival party so thank God we opened it the day before, otherwise we wouldn’t of had time to use it since it didn’t work at first. Smaller pieces of candy are best. (Ex lollipops, peppermint size candy). Bigger pieces won’t work, or they’ll take forever.
customer_reviews.author: Shay J

customer_reviews.title: Toddler LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Our sons favorite Christmas present. He’s 2, now almost 3, and still uses is daily. We bought small toys for it and we just put those back in once he “wins” them all. He’ll do this over and over, every day, all the time. I only wish we could shut of the ridiculously loud carnival music.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheaply made and won’t last a week
customer_reviews.text: The company sent me the wrong item to begin with it wasn’t suppose to have sounds or lights. The item came defective and only works by sliding something in the on slot when the coins go. Says it comes with a 6 month warranty but after two months they still have not resent the correct one or refunded me the money! This was for an autistic child who get very easily over stimulated by loud annoying sounds and flashing lights but the company didn’t seem to care less when I reached out to them. For that alone I’d go somewhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolelee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good, the execution is lacking. It just doesn't work very well. It's really hard to pick up anything that has any size at all and the music that plays is LOUD! You can't fill the machine up very much because there just isn't enough room to pick things up. And the items need to be small, even then they are hard to pick up. Very frustrating for children.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny Pesch

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really thought that it would lift mini candy bars. I tried a mini Reece’s peanut butter cup in the crane, it would not pick it up. I also had a mini butterfingers in the crane and that would not pick up either. I was a little disappointed. I did find some mini Laffy taffey that did work and jelly fish mini that worked. I am using it as a b-day present to my 4 year old, hopping he will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Received last night and have can’t even remove the screw from the battery cover. I tried getting underneath it from many different angles and nothing. So, not sure if it even works or not.
customer_reviews.author: marivic1212

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s birthday and I’m on day 5 of him playing with it nonstop! I would say this was a huge success! All of his friends love it too! I will be buying another for a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Abcasey

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but crazy loud
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning that the music is super loud. So loud that we ended up returning it. There's no option to turn off or lower the sound. You could muffle the sound by placing something over the speaker. Otherwise the product is fine and cute (a little hard to get stuff in and out but that will likely be true of all these claw machines).
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: it was the life of our party 🥳
customer_reviews.text: Keep everyone at the party busy both children and adults. Could not lower the volume so when kids played with it..it is always loud All in All this was the center attention of my daughter's birthday party, everyone talked about the claw machine. Coins were a cute and great touch kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Debz1009

customer_reviews.title: Does not work consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my third grade classroom. The first time it was used it was great. After that, it worked intermittently and now, two months after purchase, it does not work at all. Very disappointing. I spoke to several others who had this product as well and they too experienced poor performance. Such a great idea but certainly not worth the money...especially on a teacher's salary.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Wakeman

customer_reviews.title: Funtimes!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the machine to promote eye tracking for my munchkin. He sits there laughing and giggling while I play and draw his attention to the claw. He's a long way from playing with it on his own, but it is fun.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little claw machine! I bought for my teen sons and read reviews first. I put tape over the speaker on the bottom and it helps reduce the loud music. It only takes a thin layer of prizes along the bottom or the claw doesn't pick things up. It picks up mini candy bars and folded dollar bills in ours. They like the music because it speeds up when time is almost up and makes it more exciting. It lights up too. Pretty cool little machine.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. I'm an adult and I love this. It can be a little difficult to catch candy but once you catch one you want to keep trying to catch more. I recommend using mini candies anything bigger might be hard to catch. Every time my nephew comes over if he wants candy he's got to catch it :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Chhour

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! Works great, just don’t overfill with prizes or the claw can’t open and get anything. Purchased this for my daughters carnival theme birthday party! She has used it already. So have I it’s so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chanese

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Loud
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty nice toy and my kids enjoyed it very much but I wouldn’t pay $48 for it. Although it’s fun, it’s really loud with no way to turn off the noise and it lags sometimes. Overall, it’s not as amazing as the video puts it out to be but it’s not that bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work too good
customer_reviews.text: Tried with several size candies and it’s so hard to pick up anything. Also this machine is very very loud, super annoying. I bought some dum dum lollipops to see if those will work but over all the claw doesn’t work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: It's all right.
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. It does what it says. My son likes it. It is entertaining. It looks better than the picture which looks cheaply made and seems easy to break, but it's well made. Nothing much to say otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a week now and it is a hit! I’ve tried many toys and the claw has no problem picking them up! Happy kids and even the adults have fun. Yes it’s noisy, I think it’d be boring if it wasn’t. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with claw machines, so this was the perfect birthday gift for him. We have played with it for hours. Love the music that goes along with playing the claw, and nicely not too loud as is the usual case with kids toys. Warning when using the toy, can not have too many things in the case or the claw with not pick-up items. We used chewing gum, toy tops and super balls.
customer_reviews.author: Tinna Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fun little machine
customer_reviews.text: Very cute... all the kids have enjoyed this little machine... it would be perfect if there was a volume button or a way to turn the sound off. Other than that it was definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C~

customer_reviews.title: Great party toy !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter for her birthday. Age 10. All the kids loved it at the party.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Chambers

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP! Bought this for my grandsonson guess what! The claw doesnt pick up. His excitement went frm a 10 to a zero in less than five minutes. I feel so bad. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Frey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: 1st one with received broken company amediately sent a replacement which is now been used thousands of times by my child and if at last with my child for a week it will last with any child for a year
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mason

customer_reviews.title: Put a coin in to make work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Follow up on my last review. I was unaware that you had to put a coin in to get anything to work (lights, claw, sound) even with an on off button it seems like it doesn’t work. It’s a really fun toy and my kids are loving it
customer_reviews.author: care26

customer_reviews.title: Very LOUD, but fun game
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this claw machine! It’s easy for him to use & it’s great fun. I only wish that there was a volume control as it’s beyond loud! I’ve covered the speaker area with duct tape, but to no avail. If you’re looking for a quiet game, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hedgpeth-More

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This works well. Bought this for my daughter for her birthday. She loved playing with it. The claw is very weak and there's no way to turn the music volume down. Other than that great item.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree London

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price music is loud : ) I had at a 10 yr old bday party and kids lost interest 1 boy was good at it but it took a long time. I got the squishes in the picture. I thought candy was too small.
customer_reviews.author: MCGFM

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a reward when my kids have a good day or do something kind. They get a coin and they can try to get a cool item out of this at the end of the day!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The claws are very weak on this machine. You can only use tiny candy like fire balls. It will not pick up a snack size candy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for Christmas. It is bigger then I thought. He will love this. I added batteries and tested it out. It's alot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie R

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: Have had for about a month, it started making a grinding noise when moving the claw back and fourth, now it doesn’t work at all:(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but music
customer_reviews.text: looks, good, does the job and fun, but music... no way to turn it off or reduce volume and sound is so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Shoegal

customer_reviews.title: Not a great Crane game
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this crane game is great. Looks like a real crane game that you can fill with candy or toys. The problem is it's hard to use with a joystick and doesn't pick up very much. I really wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Lou

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Didn’t work. I thought if I bought a more expensive one, that it would work. Nope. No bueno. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: A very well worth the money to buy. Kids love it and I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy R. Bayn usn

customer_reviews.title: 1 AND DONE :(
customer_reviews.text: One month and done that is :( I tried replacing batteries, making sure nothing was blocking the claw but alas nothing worked. It's a shame because it really "GRABBED" my kids attention. It was fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Cute as can be and of great quality. Perfect for fun with the little kids or a silly evening with adults.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Stark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, lots of fun for my 3 and 7 year old boys! I used small plastic eggs with toys for easter and it worked great. I have not tried candy yet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pope

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months and canon be return anymore
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 2 months, and of course the return window was already closed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Angels

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy, can get loud.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this thing...can get a little loud but other then that I've had not 1 problem.
customer_reviews.author: MASTER ROSHI

customer_reviews.title: Crane chain broke
customer_reviews.text: Crane chain broken, didn’t last my kids are not happy, very disappointed, company should return the money back , amazon must work on returning money back to my card
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat, but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it but it uses cheap parts. The claw lift chain broke within 2 weeks. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Awesome claw machine. I bought it as a holiday gift for my nephew and he fell in love with it right away. Great gift for young kids!
customer_reviews.author: Uni

customer_reviews.title: Grand kids AND parents love this
customer_reviews.text: Got it for them on Christmas. I think their still fighting over whos next........
customer_reviews.author: Girley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I know it was a toy but so disappointed that it would not work. returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Claw machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Grandson's birthday, fun toy, kids love it! Also bought the box of stuffed animals to fill the machine, perfect challenge for young kids
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for a special needs client.. I set it up last night with candy and small prizes. The chain sticks and gets caught does not operate correctly. Today is her BD and I’m not going to gift her something that doesn’t work properly. It’s a real pain to go through the return policy .. I’m out of money with no gift to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s too hard for the kids to grab anything you put in there. They got very frustrated and lost interest quickly. Lots of $$$ to spend for nothing!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandolin8

customer_reviews.title: Let Down :(
customer_reviews.text: This broke after about 10 times of using! Super disappointed because they kids were So excited!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it,as did the entire family. The music is a little loud and annoying,though. Seems to be built well,good quality,not cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: judy crook

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t over load with too many items . 5 year old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult grabbing anything but it's fun trying.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: We gave it as a gift and we hear the kid loves it and is still playing with it 1 month later.
customer_reviews.author: Casa De Oro

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gag gift for my son. It is small!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Claw machine
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for any kid. Add any toy or candy for prizes to win.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Total Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The claw would not open. The kids were very disappointed. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ShastaO

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with finger puppets but not large items. When first opened the box a tie that looks like a wire has to be snipped and removed and had us wondering if we had ruined the machine for a few minutes. The tie is difficult to get to.The kids love it! Requires adult supervision for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Very slow. The claw is weak. Sound is annoying, but I was prepared for that from other reviews. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Denkin

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with the kids, it was perfect an arrived earlier than expected
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Collins

customer_reviews.title: Entertain your kids away from smartphones
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it just wished it had a volume control to turn it down or off
customer_reviews.author: David A Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Fun game! Sound is annoying
customer_reviews.text: This was my son’s favorite gift! We’ve had it for 6 months and its still working great! Just know the sound gets really annoying lol
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Fun but loud
customer_reviews.text: Very fun product. The only downside is the loud music that plays. It is fun for children, but definitely a bit much for the adults
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love it. And it seems sturdy. Would definitely purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: We followed the instructions sent to us as well as what came with the Claw Machine. We used brand-new D batteries as suggested and the claw chain wouldn't allow the claw to go back up. My daughter is sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Claw doesn’t really grab.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t pick much up. It is a good concept, but the claw doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had tons of fun with this machine, but it is quite loud.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: AMazing for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves to play claw machine. This saves us money... can actually just play at home. nice sound and lights. Ket him entertained for an hour :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. JAVIER

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on Oct 17 The power does not turn on anymore. Of course, I’ve Already checked with new batteries to make sure. Unfortunately, it does not work anymore. It’s not cheap to buy but the quality is cheap...I regret that I bought it for my little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ability to play this machine without having to pay money each time. I really like to play the Claw Machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud and claw doesn’t work great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids for Christmas- the music was so loud it made the game totally unenjoyable and the claw picked up one treat out of a dozen tries. We ended up returning it
customer_reviews.author: kendra fischer

customer_reviews.title: Useless product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just put batteries in this. The chain is stuck on the claw so it's totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Hedge

customer_reviews.title: Fun time
customer_reviews.text: To much fun for my daughter, she lovet this toy
customer_reviews.author: Jose Baltazar

customer_reviews.title: Really loud
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but is so loud. There is no volume control and after a day I wished we hadn’t purchased this for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at first but it now does
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift. It takes 3 batteries and I had brand new batteries and it never came on. Update: we somehow managed to get it working
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Claw doesn't open
customer_reviews.text: I was so pump about this till after over a week of using it the claw doesn't open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Was worried to get this based on some of the reviews but works great and my daughter is obsessed! Just like with anything, be gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool mini
customer_reviews.text: Loud toy. Pricing is high for what other friends paid locally. Fun for kids to put candy in and fight over. :)
customer_reviews.author: W. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this game. Only drawback is you cannot turn off the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool gift. My 5 year old loves it. Only issue I have is, the music is to loud. I’m not sure you can turn it down.
customer_reviews.author: Micmuscles

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two months
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for maybe two months and now the claw won’t open. It was a Christmas gift that our kids loved, but it barely survived past Valentine’s Day.
customer_reviews.author: The Myers'

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Was a gift, a few days past return window today Unboxed and got it all ready. Claw does not even go side to side, only front to back. Tried till I ran out of coins, claw picked up nothing. Not even a little bit. Super annoying loud circus music.
customer_reviews.author: Ashli Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our great nieces 8th birthday......it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I went to kids birthday party that had this. It was such a big hit I New I had to get it for Christmas. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal w

product_meta.title: Bundaloo Claw Machine Arcade Game | Candy Grabber & Prize Dispenser Vending Machine Toy for Kids, with Music | Best Birthday & Christmas Gifts for Boys & Girls (Red Claw)
product_meta.description:
Are your kids getting bored with your usual party games?

Whether it’s a barbecue or a birthday, Children love to engage in all sorts of activities during get-togethers. However, they easily lose interest and are always looking for new things to do.

For your next gathering, it’s best to be prepared. Classic games, like pin the tail on the donkey and hit the piñata, are so yesterday. You need a new and unique game to fascinate the kids.

With Bundaloo’s Claw Arcade Game, your kids will enjoy hours of non-stop fun!

Reminiscent of the classic crane toy found in arcades, our product is a great party game that children will absolutely love. It tests their problem-solving skills and keeps them busy all day. Fill with all sorts of treats like candies, gum, and peppermints, and watch your little ones go crazy over their prize!

Our claw arcade game comes with 30 reusable tokens, only one is required to activate the machine. Use the 3 levers in the front to control the single claw. Move the grabbing mechanism forward and backward, left and right, and up and down to get the treat.

Not just for parties and family gatherings, this item also makes a cool and unique holiday or birthday gift. Give it to friends, family, and even co-workers who have kids. Make this the highlight of any occasion!

Here are extra features that will help you make the right choice:
✅ Requires 3 "D" sized batteries which are not included
✅ Can be used for most treats/candy or toys up to 2x2 inches wide
✅ Dimensions: Length 10 x Width 8 x Height 13.5 inches

Bundaloo is here for you! Your backed by a 6 month Warranty

Bring back gaming’s golden age and show your kids the true meaning of fun. Add our Claw Arcade Game to your cart TODAY!
feature_bullets: 🍬 HOURS OF FUN – Turn this game into a family competition! Challenge each other and see who gets the most prizes before time stops. You will definitely lose track of time with our candy grabber!

🍬 BRING BACK THE GOOD OLD DAYS – Just like the classic claw machine at the arcade, our product plays music while you are trying to grab your prize. It’s a great activity for hand and eye coordination.
🍬 IDEAL FOR GET-TOGETHERS –Whether you’re hosting a party or simply enjoying family bonding time, our item brings the arcade right into your home. It’s the perfect game for adults and kids!

🍬 EASY TO USE – This retro item is easy to open so you can reload it with all sorts of small treats. Insert your token and watch the machine come to life. Move the levers up, down, left, and right. IMPORTANT: Always make sure to use New Batteries for Claw to work properly
🍬100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We take pride in the quality of our product that’s why we are backing it up with a 6-month warranty. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us.
